String.p: Read this License Agreement carefully before using this Software.

BY USING THIS SOFTWARE IN ANY WAY YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTOOD, AND AGREED TO THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE TERMS, DO NOT USE THIS SOFTWARE IN ANY WAY AND PROMPTLY RETURN IT AND DELETE ANY COPIES OF IT IN YOUR POSSESSION.

All rights are exclusively owned by the author Frantz RAIA ("Stra Software"). All rights not expressly granted here are reserved by the author. Stra Software grants you a non-exclusive license to test and use this software ("Tacview") and any associated documentation as indicated herein.

ul.li: Install and use Tacview as long as you comply with these terms
Freely redistribute the original Tacview installer

String.p: You MAY NOT do the following:

ul.li: Reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or alter Tacview
Remove any product identification, copyright notices, or other notices or proprietary restrictions from Tacview

String.p: Any such unauthorized use shall result in immediate and automatic termination of this license and may result in criminal and/or civil prosecution.

You are hereby licensed to make as many copies of Tacview as you wish and to redistribute it to anyone provided that all files are intact. You must redistribute Tacview installer, not the files resulting from an installation. You are not allowed to sell Tacview. Any form of media is authorized to redistribute it by any means (DVD, Cover Disc, web site) without preliminary permission from Stra Software.

Stra Software reserves the right to collect, store and use anonymous data about Tacview usage. This data will not be sold to a third party and will be exclusively used to improve the quality and stability of Tacview.
Following an evaluation period of 21 days, some advanced features of Tacview will be disabled. You must buy a Home or Professional license of Tacview if you wish to continue enjoying these features.

To register as a Home or Professional user, complete the online registration form and send it with the registration fee to one of the authorized registration sites. Go to http://tacview.strasoftware.com for the authorized sites list.

Once registered, the user is granted a non-exclusive license to use this program on as many computers as defined by the license purchased. The license key may not be redistributed, rented or leased, but it may be permanently transferred, in its entirety, if the person receiving it agrees to the terms of this license.
Tacview and its source code are proprietary products of Stra Software and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

If you fail to comply with any of the terms or conditions of this agreement, this license will be terminated. Upon such termination, you agree to stop using Tacview and destroy any copies you have made of it.

Tacview is supplied "AS IS". Stra Software disclaims all warranties, expressed or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability and of fitness for any purpose. The user must assume the entire risk of using Tacview.
Stra Software assumes no liability for damages, direct or consequential, which may result from the use of Tacview, even if Stra Software has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
